monthInvalid: Month must be a valid date
amountRequired: Amount is required when type is MONEY
daysRequired: Days are required when type is DAYS
amountPositive: Amount must be a positive number
daysPositive: Days must be a positive integer
amountOrDaysRequired: Either amount or days must be provided
amountAndDaysNotAllowed: Amount and days cannot both be provided
daysMustBeNullForMoney: Days must be null when type is MONEY
amountMustBeNullForDays: Amount must be null when type is DAYS
